message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great value considering its worth to us and its high quality.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm only willing to pay $100 for it at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm unable to meet you halfway on this one. I would like to offer the product to you for $110, which is still above its perceived value to me.
